title: Lobster and mango salad with a beurre noisette
description: Lobster with mango is often found on French menus and is served here with a citrusy salad and butter sauce.
ingredients: ½ orange, zest removed and cut into very fine strips, flesh segmented
250g/9oz mixed salad leaves (such as rocket, frissée, watercress, nasturtium or dandelion)
